cards.rules_text:
Persona [i](When aura with Persona enters return to the owners hand all auras with Persona enchanting the targeted creature.)[/i]
Enchant creature
When Persona, Jack Frost enters or enchanted creature attacks put a stun counter on target creature.

Double strike
Whenever you cast a spell or when a permanent enters from exile from exile create a [i]Void[/i] Rift [i](A void rift is a colorless token enchantment called “Void[/i] Rift”)
Whenever Skirk, Void Star attack it get +1/+1 for each void rift you control.
If you control 4 or more void rifts, sacrifice all void rifts you control then exile target creature.

Makoto Yuki, S.E.E.S Leader gets +2/+2 for each Aura with Persona attached to it.
If Makoto Yuki, S.E.E.S Leader has less than 2 auras with persona attached to it when he becomes the target of an aura with persona only return auras to your hand until he has 2 or less auras with persona.

Persona [i](When aura with Persona enters return to the owners hand all auras with Persona enchanting the targeted creature.)[/i]
Enchant creature
When Persona, Jack-O-Lanturn enters or enchanted creature attacks Persona, Jack-O-Lanturn deals 1 damage to target creature.

Persona [i](When aura with Persona enters return to the owners hand all auras with Persona enchanting the targeted creature.)[/i]
Enchant creature

Haste, first strike
Whenever Joker, Phantom Thief deals combat damage to a player, gain control of target creature that player controls it becomes an enchantment and loses all other card types.

First strike, vigilance
Non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1.
When The Nahabino enters or deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• Return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Exile target Creature.

Menace, first strike
Whenever The Demi-Fiend attacks, destroy up to one target creature with power it. If you destroy a creature this way place a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Until end of turn prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature, when damage is prevented this way place a paralysis counter on the creature that dealt that damage. [i](A creature with a Paralysis counter can not have first strike or double strike, if a creature would block or become blocked by a creature with a Paralysis counter it gains first strike while in combat.[/i]

Deal 1 damage and place a bleed counter on each of up to three target creatures. [i](When a creature with a bleed counter attacks or blocks it deals damage to itself equal to the number of bleed counters on it and then remove half of the counters rounded up.)[/i]

First strike
At then beginning of your end step, if you have one or fewer cards in your hand, draw a card and untap up to one target land.

First strike, haste
Fight for your life! [i](If you have no emotion, it starts at 1. It increases once on each turn when you lose life. Max emotion is 5.)[/i]
[i]Manifest E.G.O — [/i]When your emotion is at 3 or greater, When Gebura, The Red Mist deals damage it deals double that damage instead.

Whenever a source controlled by an opponent deals damage to you that player becomes the villain. [i](only one player can be the villain)[/i] 
The Queen of Hatred Must attack the villain if able.
When this creature attacks the villain, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of your end step, if this creature did not deal damage to the villain transform The Queen of Hatred.
cards.rules_text2:
Flying, menace, trample
Whenever a source controlled by an opponent deals damage to you that player becomes the villain.
When this creature transforms into the The Serpent of Hatred, it deals damage equal to its power equal to each other creature.

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less equal to the difference between your life and the life of the player with the highest life.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

When Furina de Fontaine enters the battlefield create three 1/1 blue Elemental tokens.
Non-Elemental creatures you control get +1/+0 for each attacking elemental you control.

Create a Character
Reach
When Beastmaster Hunter enters create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, then gain control of target creature with power less than this creatures power.

Create a character [i](Choose a creature type from among; Human, Dwarf, Gnome, Elf, Alien, Werewolf, Orc, Troll, Zombie, Minotaur and Goblin. This creature enters as that creature type in addition to its others.)[/i]

Indestructible
When you cast this spell create two 1/1 Construct artifact creature tokens with flying.
This creatures toughness is equal to the number of other creatures you control.
Whenever another creature you control dies, creatures you control get +1/+0 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
Flying

Create a character
When Demonology Warlock enters create a 1/1 black Demon token.
Whenever another demon enters under your control, deal 1 damage to any target.

Create a character
Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step Affliction Warlock deals 1 damage to each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

Create a character
Lifelink
Whenever this creature attacks, mill 3 cards, then it gets +1/+1 for each creature milled this way and you lose 1 life for each non-creature milled this way.
Exile target creature.

Create a character
Lifelink
{T}: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature, when damage is prevented this way you gain life equal to then damage prevented.
